mapper.sql: ID, REMOTE_ADDR, REMOTE_USER, TIME_LOCAL, REQUEST_TIME, STATUS, BODY_BYTES_SENT, HTTP_REFERER, HTTP_USER_AGENT, HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR, COUNTRY_NAME_ZH, COUNTRY_NAME_EN, COUNTRY_ISO_CODE, CITY_NAME, POSTAL, STATE, YEAR, YEAR_MONTH, YEAR_MONTH_DAY, YEAR_MONTH_DAY_HOUR, YEAR_MONTH_DAY_HOUR_MINUTE, INPUT_DATE, INPUT_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_NGINX_LOG (ID, REMOTE_ADDR, REMOTE_USER, TIME_LOCAL, REQUEST_TIME, STATUS, BODY_BYTES_SENT, HTTP_REFERER, HTTP_USER_AGENT, HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR, COUNTRY_NAME_ZH, COUNTRY_NAME_EN, COUNTRY_ISO_CODE, CITY_NAME, POSTAL, STATE, YEAR, YEAR_MONTH, YEAR_MONTH_DAY, YEAR_MONTH_DAY_HOUR, YEAR_MONTH_DAY_HOUR_MINUTE, INPUT_DATE, INPUT_TIME, REQUEST ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remoteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.timeLocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bodyBytesSent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.httpReferer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.httpUserAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.httpXForwardedFor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countryNameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countryNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countryIsoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yearMonthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yearMonthDayHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yearMonthDayHourMinute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inputTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.request,jdbcType=CLOB} )
